scripts.test: npm run eslint && npm run abaplint
scripts.merge.ci: cp zabapgit.abap ci/zabapgit_standalone.prog.abap && cd ci && abaplint --format codeframe && cd ..
scripts.unit: npm run build && echo RUNNING && node output/index.mjs
scripts.coverage: npm run unit && c8 node output/index.mjs && c8 report --reporter=html
scripts.integration: rm -rf output && cp test/abap_transpile.json test/abap_transpile_int.json && sed -i 's/src,deps/test\/src,src,deps/g' test/abap_transpile_int.json && abap_transpile test/abap_transpile_int.json && echo RUNNING && node output/index.mjs
